00012         display: block;

00017 <?php
00018 $_SERVER;
00019 $used = array();
00020 function printTree($id, $root) {
00021   global $used;
00022   print  "<ul>\n";
00023   while(!is_null($name = key($root))) {
00024     print("<li>\$$id" . "[$name]");
00025     $array = current($root);
00026     if(is_array($array)) {
00027       print(": [" . count($array) . "]\n");
00028       if(!isset($used[$name]) && count($array) > 0) {
00029         $used[$id] = true;
00030         printTree($name, $array);
00031       }
00032     } else {
00033       print(" = $array");
00034     }
00035     print("</li>\n");
00036     next($root);
00037   }
00038   print("</ul>\n");
00039 }
00040 printTree("GLOBALS", $GLOBALS);
00041 ?>
00042   </body>
00043 </html>
